speedhack.name: Speedhack
speedhack.description:
<cg>Toggle Speedhack</c> = <cl>C</c>
Slows down the game to the desired value, only works while recording a macro.

frame_stepper.name: Frame Stepper
frame_stepper.description:
<cg>Advance Frame</c> = <cl>V</c>
<cg>Disable</c> = <cl>B</c>
Lets you advance frame by frame for more precision.

vanilla.name: Vanilla
vanilla.description:
Stops recording the player's position during an input. Macro might be less accurate.
Moderately decreases macro size.

frame_fix.name: Frame Fixes
frame_fix.description:
Improves accuracy by recording the player's position every frame to make sure the macro doesn't break.
Heavily increases macro size.

auto_enable_play.name: Auto-Enable Play
auto_enable_play.description: Toggles playing the macro automatically when you finish recording a level.

override_macro_mode.name: Override Macro Mode
override_macro_mode.description: Ignores the mode the macro was originally recorded in and uses the current mode.
